name: Running Away
description:
You run through the streets of London and destroy the lamps and red buses that appear on your way. You must use your hands to break the obstacles. Run, destroy, earn points and compare them with other players. More objects you destroy, more points you will get.

          Features:
  •      addictive gameplay.
  •      simple to play (can use one hand).
  •      built-in online records.
  •      collect achievements.

     Play this very simple game and share your opinion in comments.

     Download APK file for Android.
